job_history.work_description: Worked with physicians and other providers, patients and carriers to develop an IT infrastructure to efficiently navigate the rapidly changing California Workers Compensation revisions.
Developed and implemented their Remote Care Services Program for HELP Pain Medical Network.
Strategic plan included the implementation and validation of a system spanning 63 sites in 23 countries.
Taught global regulatory compliance, Good Manufacturing Practices, Good Clinical Practices, Good Laboratory Practices, CGE&Y validation tools and methodology.

projects.description: Developed and implemented the Remote Care Services Program for HELP Pain Medical Network.
Designed and developed corporate quality systems for multinational Pharmaceutical companies.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has led multiple projects across different domains, including the implementation of a system spanning 63 sites in 23 countries and the development of the Remote Care Services Program, indicating expert-level mastery.
